backend/main.mo: Motoko actor importing and including a blob‑storage mixin with no extra logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing between Valentine experience and tool page with animations and name personalization.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationHeart: Generates 30 upward‑rising celebration hearts that auto‑clear after animation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Creates 20 endlessly floating hearts with random size, opacity, and timing.
frontend/src/components/SmilingEmojiAnim: Shows bouncing smiling emojis on celebration trigger and removes them after animation.
frontend/src/components/ValentineCard.ts: Interactive Valentine card with evasive “No” button, celebratory “Yes” response, and personalized text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor using Internet Identity and react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, identity loading, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and numerous custom keyframe animations for the Valentine UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up React root with react-query and the InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the App.
frontend/src/pages/WishlinkToolPage.tsx: UI page for generating personalized shareable Valentine links with name input and copy-to-clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/personalization.ts: Utility functions to normalize recipient names, parse them from URLs, and build shareable personalized links.
frontend/src/utils/routing.ts: Logic to detect the /tool route, navigate between main and tool pages, and build clean base URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color variables, extended animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project structure, architecture notes, known issues, and features of the Valentine microsite.
